dict.string:
Closes all open tabs whenever any of the following occurs...
- Safari is killed - Respring - Reboot
⚑ UPDATES: (1-27-16) *Initial release (8-13-16) *Changed method to default to favorites instead of a blank page
[v.2] Tested with an iP6+ 9.0.2. (8-13-16)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
-(void) _restorePersistentDocumentState:(id) into:(id) withCurrentActiveDocument:(id) activeDocumentIsValid:(bool) restoredActiveDocumentIndex:(unsigned long long) shouldRestoreSessionData:(bool)
